name: Gold Mine Shoggoth
description:
Your father was a crook, a thief and a sorcerer. But you loved him.

He was killed by the cultists of the Cthulhu Clux Clan.
But he didn't leave you with nothing.
An acre of barren land, a gold mine and a mission:
Summon a shoggoth to avenge his death.

  • Play cards;
  • Click;
  • Earn dollars;
  • Click;
  • Make moonshine;
  • Click;
  • Buy new cards;
  • Click;
  • Start again !;
